last_episode_to_air.name: Lost Heroes (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The heroes fight their android counterparts to recover the Justice League's powers, while the Joining prepares for its final assault on Earth.

name: The Batman
overview: Billionaire Bruce Wayne fights crime and evil as the mysterious Batman.

episodes.name: The Bat in the Belfry
episodes.overview: Batman tries to prevent the Joker from poisoning Gotham City.

episodes.name: Call of the Cobblepot
episodes.overview: Batman must rescue Alfred from the clutches of the Penguin.

episodes.name: Traction
episodes.overview: Batman battles a criminal called Bane, who uses steroids to enhance his strength.

episodes.name: The Cat and the Bat
episodes.overview: Catwoman hunts for Batman and steals his utility belt.

episodes.name: The Man Who Would Be Bat
episodes.overview: A dangerous experiment turns a scientist into a hideous creature called the Man-Bat.

episodes.name: The Big Chill
episodes.overview: Batman searches for diamond thief Mr. Freeze.

episodes.name: The Big Heat
episodes.overview: Batman deals with an arsonist known as Firefly and problems involving Gotham's mayor.

episodes.name: Q&A
episodes.overview: Batman attempts to outsmart the Cluemaster, who's seeking revenge on several game-show producers.

episodes.name: The Big Dummy
episodes.overview: Batman tracks a thief known as the Ventriloquist, who appears to be controlled by a puppet called Scarface.

episodes.name: Topsy Turvy
episodes.overview: A series of crimes bears the unmistakable mark of the Joker, but he is locked up in Arkham.

episodes.name: Bird of Prey
episodes.overview: The Penguin attempts to rob Bruce Wayne's mansion while a TV crew is filming there.

episodes.name: The Rubberface of Comedy (1)
episodes.overview: The Joker uses a new weapon that turns anything into rubber or putty; the police chief wants Batman arrested.

episodes.name: The Clayface of Tragedy (2)
episodes.overview: Batman investigates a villain known as Clayface, who is able to transform into other people.

episodes.name: The Cat, the Bat and the Very Ugly
episodes.overview: During a museum robbery, a partnership is formed between Catwoman and Penguin. But when Penguin double-crosses Catwoman before she can double-cross him, she and Batman have to stop Penguin before he unleashes his true plan: harnessing the power of Ra!

episodes.name: Riddled
episodes.overview: A mysterious villain known as the Riddler challenges Yin, secretly helped by Batman, to a number of riddles.  Things are not what they seem from the riddles...

episodes.name: Fire & Ice
episodes.overview: Firefly and Mr. Freeze team up to put their devastating plan into action: permanently putting Gotham City in a never-ending winter. Once the policeman's gala charity ball is put on ice, it's all up to the Batman.

episodes.name: The Laughing Bat
episodes.overview: The Joker decides to take on the role of "Batman" and doses Bruce with Joker venom to create an arch-rival of his own.

episodes.name: Swamped
episodes.overview: Killer Croc, a half-man, half reptile plans to submerge all of Gotham in water in order to facilitate his plundering of the city.

episodes.name: Pets
episodes.overview: Penguin discovers a sonic device that allows him to turn Man-Bat into his personal slave. Meanwhile, Alfred must deal with a raccoon which has found its way into the Bat-Cave and is wreaking havoc on the electric equipment.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: Ethan Bennett is captured and put on trial for his crimes as Clayface. He's released on probation but he may find the temptations of a criminal life too great.

episodes.name: JTV
episodes.overview: Joker pirates the airwaves of Gotham in order to broadcast his crimes on TV as entertainment. When Detective Yin's overzealous new partner tries to bring the clown prince of crime down, he merely becomes Joker's latest "co-star." Batman must find where Joker is broadcasting from before he can carry out his plan to make Gotham die of laughter!

episodes.name: Ragdolls to Riches
episodes.overview: Ragdoll, a triple-jointed contortionist, crosses paths with Batman and Catwoman while continuously trying to steal priceless artifacts. Also, Selina Kyle befriends Bruce Wayne ... but what are her intentions?

episodes.name: The Butler Did It
episodes.overview: Spellbinder, a three-eyed mystic with the ability to induce both hypnosis and visions employs the servants of the rich to steal the Eye of Sarkana -- including Alfred!

episodes.name: Grundy's Night
episodes.overview: Solomon Grundy, a legendary zombie, emerges from a swamp on Halloween to wreak havoc on Gotham. But Batman and Alfred discover that there is more to Grundy than there appears.

episodes.name: Strange Minds
episodes.overview: Joker takes Detective Yin hostage, but once captured he refuses to tell of her whereabouts. Convinced it's the only way to learn Yin's location before she meets her demise, Batman uses a device created by Professor Hugo Strange to enter the bizarre brain of the Joker in search of an answer.

episodes.name: Night and the City
episodes.overview: Joker, Penguin, and Riddler battle over control of the city, until finally deciding to settle their differences by giving all of Gotham over to whoever is able to capture and discover the true identity of the Batman.

episodes.name: Batgirl Begins (1)
episodes.overview: The story of how the Commissioner's daughter became Batgirl and how her best friend becomes Poision Ivy is told.

episodes.name: Batgirl Begins (2)
episodes.overview: Continuing where we left off in the first part, Barbara Gordon becomes Batgirl in order to save the commissioner, but does Batman really want a sidekick?

episodes.name: A Dark Knight to Remember
episodes.overview: When the Batman takes a blow to the head during a fight with the Penguin, Gotham is left without its defender while an amnesiac Bruce Wayne must consider if he's a coward or not.

episodes.name: A Fistful of Felt
episodes.overview: After his most recent crime spree, Arnold Wesker is taken to Arkham and apparently ""cured"" by Dr. Hugo Strange. A new career as a children's entertainer lies before Wesker ... but can he escape the shadow of Scarface?

episodes.name: RPM
episodes.overview: A new villain, Gearhead, makes his first appearance robbing a charity race, and Batman soon finds himself forced to upgrade the Batmobile to keep up with the cybernetic bad guy.

episodes.name: Brawn
episodes.overview: The Joker is on a rampage when he gets hold of Bane's injection system and turns himself into a rampaging beast.

episodes.name: The Laughing Cats
episodes.overview: When a rare Black Siberian Leopard is stolen, Batman and Batgirl suspect Catwoman and go to protect the second Black Siberian Leopard. But what happens when Joker beats them to the punch and brings the cats to Killgore Steed? It's a maze of doom with dangerous creatures. Can Catwoman, Batman, and Batgirl escape, or will they end up on Joker's wall?

episodes.name: Fleurs du Mal
episodes.overview: High-ranking Gotham officials begin to embrace environmental causes after the delivery of mysterious plants, and it becomes clear they're under the influence of ... Poison Ivy.

episodes.name: Cash For Toys
episodes.overview: When Wayne Industries shuts down Cosmo Krank, a toymaker with a spotty safety record, the demented villain takes revenge by trying to shut down Bruce Wayne - permanently - with his diabolical toys.

episodes.name: The Apprentice
episodes.overview: Inspired by the Batman/Batgirl partnership, the Joker decides to recruit his own sidekick and gain a partner in crime.

episodes.name: Thunder
episodes.overview: Maximillian Zeus, a millionaire who is also a Greek history fanatic, takes control of Gotham from the sky after losing to Mayor Grange in a re-election.

episodes.name: The Icy Depths
episodes.overview: The Penguin, Mr. Freeze, and Alfred's old school chum are all on the trail of a sunken treasure in Gotham Harbor.

episodes.name: Gotham's Ultimate Criminal Mastermind
episodes.overview: Hugo Strange creates a AI database called DAVE (Digitally Advanced Villain Emulator), encoded with the minds of Gotham's greatest criminals, in order to better predict their crimes. However, DAVE breaks free and proclaims himself to be "Gotham's ultimate criminal mastermind".

episodes.name: A Matter of Family
episodes.overview: After a young circus performer named Dick Grayson loses his parents to a criminal named Tony Zucco, Bruce Wayne adopts the young boy. Once Bruce's secret is revealed, Dick joins Batman as his new sidekick, Robin. Together, they set out to find Zucco and bring him to justice.

episodes.name: Team Penguin
episodes.overview: After watching a movie about criminal masterminds, Penguin gets the idea to form a team of Gotham's greatest villains in order to finally take Batman down. Meanwhile, Batgirl and Robin must learn how to work together.

episodes.name: Clayfaces
episodes.overview: After the Joker's plan to make all the dogs laugh like hyenas is thwarted by Clayface (Ethan Bennett), he plans to prove himself to Batman by turning a new leaf. Meanwhile, actor Basil Karlo steals the mutagen responsible for Ethan Bennett for becoming Clayface and he becomes the new Clayface. Can Batman trust Ethan enough to help him stop Karlo?

episodes.name: The Everywhere Man
episodes.overview: When evidence from a series of art thefts by the Everywhere Man, a new costumed villain with the power to replicate, implicates Bruce's close friend John Marlowe, Batman believes there must be another explanation. Now, Batman must unmask the identity of the "Everywhere Man" and prove his friend's innocence.

episodes.name: The Breakout
episodes.overview: After Batman apprehends Black Mask, his henchmen plan to spring him from Gotham P.D. so that Black Mask can activate his doomsday device. When Batman is captured, Batgirl and Robin must stop the villain on their own.

episodes.name: Strange New World
episodes.overview: Hugo Strange infects the population of Gotham City with a virus that transforms them into zombies, and only Batman and Robin are left to find and distribute the antidote. But when Robin falls, only Batman can save the day. But not everything is at it seems ...

episodes.name: Artifacts
episodes.overview: A thousand years into the future, the citizens of new Gotham must uncover the history of the Batman in order to stop a new Mr. Freeze.

episodes.name: Seconds
episodes.overview: The Bat Team goes up against an unstoppable thief who knows their every move.

episodes.name: Riddler's Revenge
episodes.overview: The Riddler and Batman are dropped at the bottom of Gotham Harbor ... and the Riddler reveals his origins.

episodes.name: Two of a Kind
episodes.overview: When Harleen Quinzell is cancelled from her television program, Joker takes an interest and decides to groom her as his new partner in crime, Harley Quinn.

episodes.name: Rumors
episodes.overview: The villains of Gotham City are disappearing, each one defeated and captured by an invisible vigilante named Rumor. Batman and Robin must defeat Rumor before he has a chance to execute the villains.

episodes.name: The Joining (1)
episodes.overview: Bruce discovers that Wayne Industries is distributing alien technology across the world, and gains the aid of a mysterious new ally.

episodes.name: The Joining (2)
episodes.overview: Martian Manhunter's prediction of an alien invasion by The Joining has come true. As Batman tries to stop them on his own, he learns that even working with a team will stop The Joining.

episodes.name: The Batman/Superman Story (1)
episodes.overview: Batman and Superman find themselves teamed up when Lex Luthor begins his operations in Gotham City to take down his arch-nemesis, and employs a horde of the Batman's villains to do so.

episodes.name: The Batman/Superman Story (2)
episodes.overview: Batman and Robin must battle Superman, who is under Lex Luthor's mind control, as the villain plans to launch a wave of robots and take over the world's armies.

episodes.name: Vertigo
episodes.overview: Batman welcomes another member of the Justice League to Gotham as he teams up with Green Arrow when Vertigo, a villain who can affect people's sense of balance, arrives in the city with a diabolical plan.

episodes.name: White Heat
episodes.overview: Perpetual loser Firefly tries to upgrade his powers with the aid of his new girlfriend Blaze, but is exposed to radioactive phosphorous and takes on a new more dangerous identity as... Phosphorus.

episodes.name: A Mirror Darkly
episodes.overview: Batman and Robin team up with the Flash to thwart Mirror Master's plans to trap everyone in their own mirror image.

episodes.name: Joker Express
episodes.overview: Gotham citizens are bursting into hysterical laughter and dumping stolen goods into the river, and Batman is soon on the trail of the Joker.

episodes.name: Ring Toss
episodes.overview: Green Lantern seeks out Batman's help in locating renegade Green Lantern Sinestro, but when the villain comes to Earth, the Penguin ends up with the hero's power ring.

episodes.name: The Metal Face of Comedy
episodes.overview: With the help of a slacker, Joker's mind is downloaded into a computer, enabling him to control the new WayneTech Nanobots. This creates a new and improved body who attempts to destroy Batman, Robin, and the original Joker.

episodes.name: Attack of the Terrible Trio
episodes.overview: A trio of college misfits use stolen mutagens from Dr. Kirk Langstrom to transform themselves into animal forms and get revenge on those who have scorned them.

episodes.name: The End of the Batman
episodes.overview: Wrath and Scorn, two twins of the Dynamic Duo, are helping the villains of Gotham City. But what happens when both Batman and Wrath uncover each other's identities?

episodes.name: What Goes Up...
episodes.overview: When Black Mask hires Hawkman's arch-nemesis the Shadow Thief to break him out of Arkham and assist in the theft of a meteorite, Batman must team up with fellow Justice League member Hawkman to defeat the villains.

episodes.name: Lost Heroes (1)
episodes.overview: The super-powered members of the Justice League begin disappearing one by one. Only Batman and Green Arrow are left to investigate and discover that old enemies are involved.

episodes.name: Lost Heroes (2)
episodes.overview: The heroes fight their android counterparts to recover the Justice League's powers, while the Joining prepares for its final assault on Earth.
